comments.author: Jodye @ Chocolate and Chou Fleur
comments.content: This looks like a wonderful dish. The clementine oil is a lovely idea, and if there are capers included, I'm almost always interested. I'll have to give this a try!

comments.author: Pat Machin
comments.content: I often add mushrooms to a salad as an 'extra' but like the idea of making them the star of the show. Great idea!
